sentence.Network_en: It is a very accountable obstinacy.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一种完全可以理解的固执态度.

sentence.Network_en: I might have become a dangerous man with all that stubbornness and obstinacy built into me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我若是养就了那种根深蒂固的犟脾气，也许就成了危险分子。

sentence.Network_en: It is happening in this fashion because of the obstinacy of one woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 事情会如此发展是因为一个女人的固执己见。

list.abs: obstinacy的例句 Sheer obstinacy prevented her from apologizing. 她固执得就是不道歉。 His obstinacy was irritating. 他那顽固的劲真气人。 < obstetrics.
He bitted the file to English obstinacy and broke his teeth ., 他要打破英国的顽固而折断了牙齿.

list.key: He bit the file to English obstinacy and broke his teeth
list.exp: 他要打破英国人的顽固而折断了牙齿
list.abs: 3.His obstinacy drives me mad!他顽固不化把我气得火冒三丈!4.He bit the file to English obstinacy and broke his teeth.他要打破英国人的顽固而折断了牙齿。英英解释:名词obstinacy:
He has a streak of obstinacy in him ., 他有一点儿固执.

entry.def: If you describe someone as obstinate, you are being critical of them because they are very determined to do what they want, and refuse to change their mind or be persuaded to do something else.

example.ex: He is obstinate and determined and will not give up...
example.tran: 他非常顽固，而且又铁了心，是不会放弃的。

example.ex: She was a wicked and obstinate child.
example.tran: 她是个淘气又执拗的孩子。

entry.tran: 难以移动的；难以改变的；难以消除的
entry.def: You can describe things as obstinate when they are difficult to move, change, or destroy.

example.ex: ...rusted farm equipment strewn among the obstinate weeds.
example.tran: 扔在恣意蔓生的杂草丛中的锈迹斑斑的农具

means.word_mean: 1. the trait of being difficult to handle or overcome
2. resolute adherence to your own ideas or desires

auth_sentence.content: Her father would never have pardoned such obstinacy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her father would never have pardoned such obstinacy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her father would never have pardoned such obstinacy.

auth_sentence.content: She...had a quiet obstinacy that wore down opposition.
auth_sentence.res_content: She...had a quiet obstinacy that wore down opposition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She...had a quiet obstinacy that wore down opposition.

auth_sentence.content: The House of Lords show not firmness...but inelastic obstinacy and obstructiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content: The House of Lords show not firmness...but inelastic obstinacy and obstructiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The House of Lords show not firmness...but inelastic obstinacy and obstructiveness.

sentences.en: He rebuked them for their pedantries and obstinacies.
sentences.cn: 他责骂他们的迂腐和固执。
